JobTitle: Finance Analyst / Program Cost Controls - Remote

Financial management of the Romania & Sweden Technical Assistance contract, including Earned Value Management, EACs, Billings and Cash Collection.    Preparing various analyses to ensure accurate reporting and early warning of issues.
